name: incandescence (Bonnem)
description:
Project 7 - Bonnecaze King

===================================================

Find the 10 "Whisps" in the scene. 

Use your mic to light up the world; however, making noise will attracts enemies towards you. 

===================================================

Programmer: Matthew Bonnecaze & Sound Editor

Level Designer: Skip King

"Windy, creaky old house ambience" (from freesound.org by pfranzen)
